Comments_List: Electronic materials and their electrical properties as well as material growth
One of the strength is that one can learn about thermal dynamics in material growth.
Maybe can be more explicit in theory part.
Yes, some parts of this course, for example, defects and crystallization of materials are essential to not only material science but also device physics.
